RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttributeModifierListItem

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tAttributeModifierListItem Struct Reference

#include <attributemodifierlist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A struct used to store an attribute's modifier.

A attribute's modifier can modify a numeric attribute. It is found in the website-side xml file in the form +? or -? where ? is an integer.

Definition at line 62 of file attributemodifierlist.h.

 the type (sign) of the modifier
